content: to end heel turn row 1 rs sl1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn peachy socks by debbie ford page 2 row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn pattern on your last round pm after the first 28 32 36 sts row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before your last turn ssk using 1 st from each side of the gap k1 toe turn round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker row 4 ws s1 p to 1 st before your last turn k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of p2tog using 1 st from each side of the gap round k2tog p1 turn round 2 k to end of round repeats row 3-4 until all stitches have been repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 28 worked 36 sts left you will have 18 20 22 sts on your needle cut your working yarn leaving a tail of and the rs should be facing you approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you gusset can kitchener stitch your toe closed now you are going to start working in the round again set up round this will be your bor place a marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pm k 0 2 4 work row 1 of peachy pattern k 0 2 4 pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog k 0 2 4 work next row in peachy pattern across the front of sock k 0 2 4 sm ssk k to end of round round 2 k to m sm k 0 2 4 work next row in peachy pattern across the front of sock k 0 2 4 sm k to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have decreased down to your original stitch count thanks to polly thomas for the copy with 28 32 36 sts on the back of your sock i would love to see your finished projects k to m sm this is now your bor and you can please share on instagram or ravelry remove the other st markers as you work the next round @daisystitches #debbieforddesigns foot dinkydebbie continue working in established pattern until the foot measures 5 cm / 2 inches less than desired foot length i recommend ending having worked row 4 or 8 of the peachy peachy socks by debbie ford page 3 abbreviations k - knit ssk - sl 1 knitwise sl 1 knitwise place both sts back on left needle and k2tog through the p - purl back loop st/s - stitch/s yo - yarn over co - cast on bor
